description: Fix for reverting file after timeout on download and extra line at the end of output which was breaking imports for 3rd party programs.

versions.description: This update includes version checks, file encoding output, fixes for sending emails on errors, additional examples in CognosDefaults.ps1
Craig Millsap - Cognos Analytics 11 upgrade. Saving complex prompts, waiting for report to complete, and validation error messages.
Craig Millsap - Recursive nested folders, email notifications, and waiting for live report to generate.
